highlight.title: Today's Highlight
highlight.message: Don't forget to enjoy the sunshine and have a productive day!

motivational_quote.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational_quote.author: Steve Jobs

fun_fact.fact: Did you know? Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible!

motivational_gif.caption: Here's a little motivation for you!
